data.title: Pain, Suffering, & Death Class by William “Bill” Johnson

data.text:
“I am convinced that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor things present, nor things to come, nor powers, nor height, nor depth, nor any other created thing, will be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.”

~ Romans 8:38, 39

“These things have been written so that you may believe that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of God; and that believing you may have life in His name.”

~ John 20:31

In this first quarter of 2024, we have had the privilege of hosting Ruling Elder William “Bill” Johnson as our Adult Sunday School Class teacher on the important – but difficult – topic of Pain, Suffering, & Death. Over the course of 11 lessons, Mr. Johnson has walked us through a practical theology of the Christian’s experience with dark providences such as chronic pain, devastating illness, reversals in our circumstances, and death itself. All along the way, Mr. Johnson has impressed upon us the importance of persevering in the Faith which we have received as a gift from God in Christ.
